enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_FallenDown
enumval.description: decides whether to ik rotate body to match ground angle

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DontRenderThisFrame
enumval.description: force ped to stop rendering this frame (for example - drive task can stop peds rendering inside buses)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockMovementAnims
enumval.description: completely disable processing of on-foot movement anim blending for this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ZeroDesiredMoveBlendRatios
enumval.description: zero out all inputs to movement system this frame, causing ped to stop moving

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DontChangeMbrInSimpleMoveDoNothing
enumval.description: If this is set, then CTaskSimpleMoveDoNothing will not reset desired moveblendratio to zero this frame.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_FollowingRoute
enumval.description: whether this ped is following a route of some sort - used to let simplest goto task pull the ped back onto their current route segment

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_TakingRouteSplineCorner
enumval.description: whether the ped is cornering via a spline curve, which will take them off their route linesegment

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPhysicsTasks
enumval.description: do we need to call process physics for (main) tasks this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPreRender2
enumval.description: do we need to call ProcessPreRender2 for tasks

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_FiringWeapon
enumval.description: set when ped fires any weapon, so script can check the flag

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SearchingForCover
enumval.description: Set if the ped is likely to be searching for cover, used by the navmesh to load coverpoints around interested peds

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_KeepCoverPoint
enumval.description: Set if the ped wants to keep their current cover point this frame, otherwise it gets released

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsClimbing
enumval.description: If the ped is climbing, shimmying or on a ladder. Stops ProcessProbes() from happening.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsJumping
enumval.description: is the ped jumping.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsLanding
enumval.description: is landing after being in the air

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_CullExtraFarAway
enumval.description: flag Ai can set to make ped get culled further away (used for roadblock cops, crimials...)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_TaskUseKinematicPhysics
enumval.description: For use by tasks - puts the ped into Kinematic physics mode. In this mode the ped will push other objects our of the way, but not be physically affected by them

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_TemporarilyBlockWeaponSwitching
enumval.description: Stop weapon switch processing

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DoNotClampFootIk
enumval.description: Stop clamping the foot IK. Maybe the clamps should be parameters of the IK manager, but apparently that is to be refactored in future

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_MoveBlend_bFleeTaskRunning
enumval.description: TASK_SMART_FLEE, or TASK_COMPLEX_LEAVE_CAR_AND_FLEE

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsAiming
enumval.description: TASK_GUN or TASK_USE_COVER

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_MoveBlend_bTaskComplexGunRunning
enumval.description: TASK_COMPLEX_GUN (only)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PatrollingInVehicle
enumval.description: ped is patrolling in a vehicle, likely meaning they are swat or police

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsWalkingRoundPlayer
enumval.description: Whether this ped is walking around another ped (one frame latency)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_VisemeAnimsBlocked
enumval.description: Blocks viseme anims from playing

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AmbientAnimsBlocked
enumval.description: Blocks new ambient idles from starting.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ApplyVelocityDirectly
enumval.description: Should we apply the velocity directly to the physics collider or go through the force solver?

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ResetMoveGroupAfterRagdoll
enumval.description: If true, will reset the temp anim group when not ragdolling

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisablePedConstraints
enumval.description: Allow the ped to rotate around freely

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisablePlayerJumping
enumval.description: Disables player jumping if true. Reset in ResetPostPhysics, as it will be set via script

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisablePlayerVaulting
enumval.description: Disables player vaulting/climbing if true.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableAsleepImpulse
enumval.description: Disable the code that pushes peds which fall asleep in the air

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PlacingCharge
enumval.description: Setting Bomb (firing weapon is set also)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ScriptDisableSecondaryAnimationTasks
enumval.description: Disable upper body animtion tasks such as shove ped and open door anims

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_InfiniteStamina
enumval.description: Currently just for mounts, but could be expanded to anything with stamina

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockWeaponReactionsUnlessDead
enumval.description: Stops ragdoll and nm behaviors triggering from weapon damage unless the ped has died.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_InCoverFacingLeft
enumval.description: set when exiting the cover state saying if we are facing left

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForcePeekFromCover
enumval.description: if set the ped will go into peeking if they are already in cover

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_NotAllowedToChangeCrouchState
enumval.description: if set the ped will not be allowed to change their crouch state

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForcePedToStrafe
enumval.description: forces a ped to strafe

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceMeleeStrafingAnims
enumval.description: forces a ped to use the melee strafing anims when strafing

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseKinematicPhysics
enumval.description: To be used by scripts - puts the ped into Kinematic physics mode. In this mode the ped will push other objects our of the way, but not be physically affected by them

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ClearLockonTarget
enumval.description: Clears the player's lockon target next frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_CanPedSeeHatedPedBeingUsed
enumval.description: Activates can ped see hated ped generating events even when blocking of non-temp events is on

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_InstantBlendToAim
enumval.description: Makes the ped performa an instant blend to aim if starting a gun task this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceImprovedIdleTurns
enumval.description: Forces the ped to use an improved idle turning system that should help him turn to face more quickly

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_HitPedWithWeapon
enumval.description: set when damage is inflicted by this ped on another ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForcePedToUseScripCamHeading
enumval.description: forces a ped to the scripted camera heading instead of gameplay

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessProbesWhenExtractingZ
enumval.description: makes the capsule physics push the ped out of the ground even when extracting z

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_KeepDesiredCoverPoint
enumval.description: should the ped keep their desired cover point this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_HasProcessedCornering
enumval.description: whether the ped has already processed slowing down for this corner

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_StandingOnForkliftForks
enumval.description: Set when the ped standing capsule hits the forklift forks.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AimWeaponReactionRunning
enumval.description: ped is running the reaction task this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_InContactWithFoliage
enumval.description: ped is in contact with GTA_FOLIAGE_TYPE bounds

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceExplosionCollisions
enumval.description: ped will always collide with explosions, even when collision is off

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IgnoreTargetsCoverForLOS
enumval.description: when checking LOS against targets this ped will ignore their cover (if the cover exists)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockAnimatedWeaponReactions
enumval.description: Ped should not play animated damager reactions while this flag is set

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisablePedCapsule
enumval.description: Removes the ped capsule from the physics simulation

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableCrouchWhileInCover
enumval.description: Force the crouch flag to return true while in cover.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IncreasedAvoidanceRadius
enumval.description: Adds extra 2m onto the radius other peds use to avoid this ped during local steering.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceRunningSpeedForFragSmashing
enumval.description: Can be set by designers to force the ped to smash more easily through frags.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_EnableMoverAnimationWhileAttached
enumval.description: While flagged, any mover animation will be applied to the offset of the attachment.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_NoTimeDelayBeforeShot
enumval.description: While flagged, The time delay before a player can fire after aiming is 0

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SearchingForAutoVaultClimb
enumval.description: inform climb code we are doing an autovault

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ExtraLongWeaponRange
enumval.description: Extends the range of a peds weapons to 250m

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForcePlayerToEnterVehicleThroughDirectDoorOnly
enumval.description: Forces the player to only use direct access when entering vehicles

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_TaskCullExtraFarAway
enumval.description: Can be set by ai tasks on the main task tree to disable a ped getting cull from a vehicle.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsVaulting
enumval.description: Set the entire time CTaskVault is running.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsParachuting
enumval.description: Set the entire time CTaskParachute is running.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SuppressSlowingForCorners
enumval.description: If set this will prevent the ped from slowing down to take corners this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableProcessProbes
enumval.description: Disables processing of probes.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_JayWalking
enumval.description: If set then the ped is jay walking and a vehicle is allowed to run him over.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseBulletPenetration
enumval.description: Ped will use bullet penetration code.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceAimAtHead
enumval.description: Force all attackers to target the head of this ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsInStationaryScenario
enumval.description: In a scenario and not moving

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_TemporarilyBlockWeaponEquipping
enumval.description: Stop weapon equipping

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableSeeThroughChecksWhenTargeting
enumval.description: Any targeting LoS checks will fail if any materials with 'see through' materials found.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PuttingOnHelmet
enumval.description: putting on helmet

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AllowPullingPedOntoRoute
enumval.description: allows goto task to apply heading in order to pull a ped back onto their route

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ApplyAnimatedVelocityWhilstAttached
enumval.description: Allows attachment offsets to be updated from animated velocities

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AICoverEntryRunning
enumval.description: TASK_ENTER_COVER : State_PlayAIEntryAnim

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ResponseAfterScenarioPanic
enumval.description: The ped is entering threat response after panic exiting a scenario.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsNearDoor
enumval.description: Ped is near a non-vehicle door

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableDynamicCapsuleRadius
enumval.description: Turn off dynamic adjustments to ped capsules

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsRappelling
enumval.description: Is currently in a rappel task

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SkipReactInReactAndFlee
enumval.description: When this ped goes to ThreatResponse, play the flee transition but not the reaction clip if fleeing.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_CannotBeTargeted
enumval.description: Will prevent this ped from being a part of any other peds target list

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsFalling
enumval.description: Ped is in pure fall state (i.e. no parachuting, landing etc included

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceInjuryAfterStunned
enumval.description: Forces this ped to the injured state after being stunned

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_HurtThisFrame
enumval.description: The ped has entered the hurt state this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockWeaponFire
enumval.description: Prevent the ped from shooting a weapon

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ExpandPedCapsuleFromSkeleton
enumval.description: Set the ped capsule radius based on skeleton

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableWeaponLaserSight
enumval.description: Toggle the weapon laser sight off for this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PedExitedVehicleThisFrame
enumval.description: Set when ped gets set out of vehicle

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SearchingForDropDown
enumval.description: Ped is seatching for drop down

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseTighterTurnSettings
enumval.description: Ped should use tighter turn settings in human locomotion motion task

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableArmSolver
enumval.description: Disable the arm solver this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_TasksNeedProcessMoveSignalCalls
enumval.description: Set when peds require calls to ProcessMoveSignals(), for AI timeslicing to work with Move

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_NoCollisionMovementMode
enumval.description: Set when a ped is moving in an area where collisions with fixed geometry are unlikely. The ped's physics will not be forced to activate.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsNearLaddder
enumval.description: Ped is near top of a ladder

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IgnoredByAutoOpenDoors
enumval.description: Set this for a ped to be ignored by the auto opened doors when checking to see if the door should be opened.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockIkWeaponReactions
enumval.description: Ped should not play Ik damager reactions while this flag is set

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_FirstPhysicsUpdate
enumval.description: Ped was just created this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SpawnedThisFrameByAmbientPopulation
enumval.description: Ped was spawned this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SuspendInitiatedMeleeActions
enumval.description: Temporarily suspend any melee actions this frame (does not include hit reactions). Use PCF_DisableMelee to turn it off completely

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SuppressInAirEvent
enumval.description: Prevents ped from getting the in air event the next frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AllowTasksIncompatibleWithMotion
enumval.description: If set, ped will skip CheckTasksAreCompatibleWithMotion

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsEnteringOrExitingVehicle
enumval.description: TASK_ENTER_VEHICLE or TASK_EXIT_VEHICLE

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_HasGunTaskWithAimingState
enumval.description: Ped is running TASK_GUN and task's state is State_Aim

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SuppressLethalMeleeActions
enumval.description: This will suppress any melee action that is considered lethal (RA_IS_LETHAL, defined in action_table.meta)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AmbientIdleAndBaseAnimsBlocked
enumval.description: Blocks ambient idles and base animations from playing.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseAlternativeWhenBlock
enumval.description: If set, ped will use alternative aiming/firing anims

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceLowLodWaterCheck
enumval.description: If set, the ped will always force probe for being in water when in low LOD mode.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_MakeHeadInvisible
enumval.description: If set, scale the head of the ped to 0.001

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_NoAutoRunWhenFiring
enumval.description: Don't auto run when NoAutoRunWhenFiring is set.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PermitEventDuringScenarioExit
enumval.description: Ignore certain aspects (FOV checks, etc) of AffectsPedCore() on some events while the ped is playing a scenario exit.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableSteeringAroundVehicles
enumval.description: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around vehicles

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableSteeringAroundPeds
enumval.description: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around peds

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableSteeringAroundObjects
enumval.description: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around objects

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableSteeringAroundNavMeshEdges
enumval.description: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around nav mesh edges

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceCombatTaunt
enumval.description: Forces a combat taunt for peds using the insult special ability.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SkipAiUpdateProcessControl
enumval.description: True if we've already run this ped's AI and can skip it from within ProcessControl

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_OverridePhysics
enumval.description: A reset flag that disables collision and gravity on the ped and drives entity positions and rotations directly, rather than going through the physics update.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_WasPhysicsOverridden
enumval.description: True if physics was overriden during the last update.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockWeaponHoldingAnims
enumval.description: Block any onfoot weapon holding anims.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableMoveTaskHeadingAdjustments
enumval.description: True if the ped's movement task should not adjust the heading of the ped.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PreventAllMeleeTakedowns
enumval.description: Will temporarily prevent any takedown from being performed on this ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PreventFailedMeleeTakedowns
enumval.description: Will temporarily prevent any failed takedowns from being performed on this ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseTighterAvoidanceSettings
enumval.description: Ped should use tighter avoidance settings in navigation task

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsHigherPriorityClipControllingPed
enumval.description: True if the active task on the main task tree is taking responsibility for the mover track

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_VehicleCrushingRagdoll
enumval.description: Set to true if a vehicle is pressing downward on the ragdoll

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_OnActivationUpdate
enumval.description: Ped was just activated this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceMotionStateLeaveDesiredMBR
enumval.description: Set this to disable setting the desired move blendratio when forcing the motion state. Usefull for forcing a flee start, etc

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableDropDowns
enumval.description: Disable drop downs for this ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_InContactWithBIGFoliage
enumval.description: ped is in contact with GTA_FOLIAGE_TYPE bounds that are large and the player can be hidden

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableCellphoneAnimations
enumval.description: tells taskmobile phone to Blends out move network and prevents it from blending in

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableActionMode
enumval.description: Disables combat anims for ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_EquippedWeaponChanged
enumval.description: Equipped weapon changed this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_TouchingOverhang
enumval.description: Some part appears to be contrained downwards

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_TooSteepForPlayer
enumval.description: We're standing on something flagged too steep for the player to stand on

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockSecondaryAnim
enumval.description: Block any secondary scripted task animations playing on this ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsInCombat
enumval.description: This ped is running the combat task

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseHeadOrientationForPerception
enumval.description: Will use the ped's head orientation for perception tests

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsDoingDriveby
enumval.description: This ped is running a driveby gun or projectile task

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsEnteringCover
enumval.description: This ped is running a cover entry task

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceMovementScannerCheck
enumval.description: Set to make CStaticMovementScanner::Scan() check for collisions as if we were moving

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableJumpRagdollOnCollision
enumval.description: If true, the player will no longer auto-ragdoll when colliding with objects, peds, etc. while jumping

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsBeingMeleeHomedByPlayer
enumval.description: Set on the target ped in melee if the player is homing towards them

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ShouldLaunchBicycleThisFrame
enumval.description: This ped should launch the bicycle this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_CanDoBicycleWheelie
enumval.description: This ped can do a bicycle wheelie

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceProcessPhysicsUpdateEachSimStep
enumval.description: If true, ProcessPhysics() will execute completely for each physics simulation step

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisablePedCapsuleMapCollision
enumval.description: Disables collision between the ped capsule and the map (usefull in cases where the entity position is being tightly controlled outside of physics, e.g. by an animation)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableSeatShuffleDueToInjuredDriver
enumval.description: If true, motion in vehicle task won't shuffle to the driver seat just because the driver is injured

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPostMovement
enumval.description: do we need to call ProcessPostMovement for tasks

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPostCamera
enumval.description: do we need to call ProcessPostCamera for tasks

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPostPreRender
enumval.description: do we need to call ProcessPostPreRender for tasks

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PreferMeleeBodyIkHitReaction
enumval.description: This will prefer all melee hit reactions to use body ik hit reactions if ragdoll is not selected

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPhysicsTasksMotion
enumval.description: do we need to call process physics for motion tasks this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPhysicsTasksMovement
enumval.description: do we need to call process physics for movement tasks this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableFriendlyGunReactAudio
enumval.description: If set, disables friendly responses to gunshots/being aimed at.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceForwardTransitionInReactAndFlee
enumval.description: If set, force CTaskReactAndFlee to use a forward facing flee transition

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DoNotSkipNavMeshTrackerUpdate
enumval.description: If set we will not allow the NavMeshTracker update to be skipped this frame.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_RagdollOnVehicle
enumval.description: Set to true when the ragdoll is lying on top of a vehicle (note- hands, feet, forearms and shins are not included in the test)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableNMForRiverRapids
enumval.description: If set, disable NM reactions to fast moving water

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsInWrithe
enumval.description: If set, the ped is on the ground writhing and might start shooting from ground

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PreventGoingIntoStillInVehicleState
enumval.description: If set, the ped will not go into the still in vehicle pose

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseFastEnterExitVehicleRates
enumval.description: If set, the ped will get in and out of vehicles faster

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableGroundAttachment
enumval.description: If set, the ped won't attach to a ground physical when his physics disables (useful for cutscenes, etc)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceProcessPedStandingUpdateEachSimStep
enumval.description: When set, ProcessPedStanding will get called for each physics step.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableFlashLight
enumval.description: When set, the flash light on a Ai weapon will be turned off.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DoingCombatRoll
enumval.description: When set, the ped is doing a combat roll

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_CanAbortExitForInAirEvent
enumval.description: When set, the ped can abort the exit vehicle anim to go into fall

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceEnableFlashLightForAI
enumval.description: When set, the ai ped will enable their flash light

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_WaitingForCompletedPathRequest
enumval.description: This ped is waiting for a path request which is now complete, so their tasks must be updated this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_EnableSteepSlopePrevention
enumval.description: Pushes the ped through the same steep slope tolerances in TaskMotionBase that the player encounters

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPostMovementTimeSliced
enumval.description: Parallel flag to ProcessPostMovement, except this is reset in PreTask(), meaning it stays consistent across timeslicing.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_OverrideHairScale
enumval.description: Scales the ped's hair down to the specified value

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ConsiderAsPlayerCoverThreatWithoutLOS
enumval.description: Considered as a threat as part of player cover search even if they can't see the player

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_StreamActionModeAnimsIfDisabled
enumval.description: Stream action mode anims even if action mode is disabled

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceUpdateRagdollMatrix
enumval.description: Ped requires ragdoll matrix update next frame.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PreventGoingIntoShuntInVehicleState
enumval.description: If set, the ped will not go into the shunt in vehicle pose

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerPedImpactReset
enumval.description: Block ragdoll activations from animated player bumps

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DontActivateRagdollFromAiRagdollImpactReset
enumval.description: Block ragdoll activations from collisions with an ai ragdoll

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerRagdollImpactReset
enumval.description: Block ragdoll activations from collisions with a player ragdoll

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableVisemeBodyAdditive
enumval.description: If set, prevents visemes from playing any additive body animations

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_CapsuleBeingPushedByPlayerCapsule
enumval.description: Set when the player capsule is pushing up against this peds capsule

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UsingMoverExtraction
enumval.description: Set when the players capsule is getting repositioned each frame relative to an anim and origin

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_EnableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement
enumval.description: If set, turn on the voice driven mouth movement

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseTighterEnterVehicleSettings
enumval.description: Ped should use tighter (shorter) settings for entering vehicles

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_InRaceMode
enumval.description: Set when the player is in the race mode.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableAmbientMeleeMoves
enumval.description: Disable ambient (initial) melee moves

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AllowSpecialAbilityInVehicle
enumval.description: Allows the player to trigger the special ability while in a vehicle

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableInVehicleActions
enumval.description: Prevents ped from doing in vehicle actions such as starting engine, hotwiring, closing door etc.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceInstantSteeringWheelIkBlendIn
enumval.description: Forces ped to blend in steering wheel ik instantly rather than over time.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IgnoreThreatEngagePlayerCoverBonus
enumval.description: Ignores the bonus score for selecting cover that the player can engage the enemy at

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_Block180Turns
enumval.description: Blocks triggering of 180 turns in human locomotion this frame.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DontCloseVehicleDoor
enumval.description: Prevents the ped from closing the vehicle door of the car they're in

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SkipExplosionOcclusion
enumval.description: Map collision will not block this ped from being hit by explosions

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPhysicsTasksTimeSliced
enumval.description: Parallel flag to ProcessPhysicsTasks, except this is reset in PreTask(), meaning it stays consistent across timeslicing.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_MeleeStrikeAgainstNonPed
enumval.description: Set when the ped has performed a melee strike and hit any non ped material

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IgnoreNavigationForDoorArmIK
enumval.description: We will not attempt to walk around doors when using arm IK

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableAimingWhileParachuting
enumval.description: Disable aiming while parachuting

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisablePedCollisionWithPedEvent
enumval.description: Disable hit reaction due to colliding with a ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IgnoreVelocityWhenClosingVehicleDoor
enumval.description: Will ignore the vehicle speed threshold and close the door anyway

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DontWalkRoundObjects
enumval.description: Don't walk round objects that we collide with whilst moving

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_CancelLeftHandGripIk
enumval.description: Call ProcessLeftHandGripIk() to cancel left hand grip IK, at the right time of the frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ResetMovementStaticCounter
enumval.description: Will keep reset the static counter when this is set

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableInVehiclePedVariationBlocking
enumval.description: Will allow ped variations to be rendered in vehicles, even if marked otherwise

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ReduceEffectOfVehicleRamControlLoss
enumval.description: When on a mission this reset flag will slightly reduce the amount of time the player loses control of their vehicle when hit by an AI ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisablePlayerMeleeFriendlyAttacks
enumval.description: Another flag to disable friendly attack from the player. Set on the opponent you would like it to be disabled on.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsMeleeTargetUnreachable
enumval.description: Set when the melee target has been deemed unreachable (AI only)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_OverrideHairScaleLarger
enumval.description: Scales the ped's hair up to the specified value

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableDustOffAnims
enumval.description: Disable amient dust off animations

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableMeleeHitReactions
enumval.description: This ped will refrain from ever performing a melee hit reaction

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_VisemeAnimsAudioBlocked
enumval.description: Blocks viseme anims audio from playing

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AllowHeadPropInVehicle
enumval.description: This overrides PV_FLAG_NOT_IN_CAR set on any head prop and stops it from being removed when getting into the vehicle

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SetLastBoundMatricesDone
enumval.description: Ensure that the last bound matrices are only updated once per frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PreserveAnimatedAngularVelocity
enumval.description: Don't allow the locomotion task to adjust angular velocity coming from animation

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_OpenDoorArmIK
enumval.description: Set if the ped should enable open door arm IK

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseTighterTurnSettingsForScript
enumval.description: Script set flag, to force use of tighter turn settings in locomotion task

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForcePreCameraProcessExternallyDrivenDOFs
enumval.description: Set if the ped should process externally driven dofs before the pre-camera ai update

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_LadderBlockingMovement
enumval.description: Ped is waiting for ladder and blocking movement to prevent falling off

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement
enumval.description: If set, turn off the voice driven mouth movement (overrides EnableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SteerIntoSkids
enumval.description: If set, steer into skids while driving

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AllowOpenDoorIkBeforeFullMovement
enumval.description: When set, code will ignore the logic that requires the ped to be in CTaskHumanLocomotion::State_Moving

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AllowHomingMissileLockOnInVehicle
enumval.description: When set, code will bypass rel settings and allow a homing lock on to this ped when they are in a vehicle

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableHighHeels
enumval.description: Force the high heels DOF to be 0

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BreakTargetLock
enumval.description: Force lock on to break for this ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DontUseSprintEnergy
enumval.description: Player does not get tired when sprinting

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DontChangeHorseMbr
enumval.description: Similar to CPED_RESET_FLAG_DontChangeMbrInSimpleMoveDoNothing, but for horses.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableMaterialCollisionDamage
enumval.description: Don't be damaged by touching dangerous material (e.g. electic generator)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableMPFriendlyLockon
enumval.description: Don't target friendly players in MP

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableMPFriendlyLethalMeleeActions
enumval.description: Don't melee kill friendly players in MP

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IfLeaderStopsSeekCover
enumval.description: If our leader stops, try and seek cover if we can

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPostPreRenderAfterAttachments
enumval.description: do we need to call CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPostPreRenderAfterAttachments for tasks

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsUsingJetpack
enumval.description: Is ped currently using jetpack. e.g. in air

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseInteriorCapsuleSettings
enumval.description: Use Interior capsule settings

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsClosingVehicleDoor
enumval.description: Ped is closing a vehicle door

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableIdleExtraHeadingChange
enumval.description: Disable lerping the ped towards the desired heading in the locomotion idle

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_OnlySelectVehicleWeapons
enumval.description: Only allows vehicle weapons to be selected in CPedWeaponSelector::SelectWeapon

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsWarpingIntoVehicleMP
enumval.description: Set in CTaskEnterVehicle::SetPedInSeat_OnEnter if ped is warping into a vehicle in multiplayer

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_RemoveHelmet
enumval.description: Forces a ped to remove its helmet.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsRemovingHelmet
enumval.description: Returns true if ped is removing its helmet.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_NeverRagdoll
enumval.description: Disable all attempts by this ped to ragdoll.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableWallHitAnimation
enumval.description: Disable stuck wall hit animation for the ped this frame.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PlayAgitatedAnimsInVehicle
enumval.description: Play agitated anims in vehicle - overrides normal sit idle

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsSeatShuffling
enumval.description: Returns true if ped is shuffling seat.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsThrowingProjectileWhileAiming
enumval.description: True if we are running TASK_AIM_AND_THROW_PROJECTILE as a subtask of TASK_AIM_GUN_ON_FOOT.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableProjectileThrowsWhileAimingGun
enumval.description: Set by script command DISABLE_PLAYER_THROW_GRENADE_WHILE_USING_GUN.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AllowControlRadioInAnySeatInMP
enumval.description: Allows ped in any seat to control radio in multiplayer.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableSpycarTransformation
enumval.description: Blocks ped from manually transforming spycar to/from car/sub modes.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockQuadLocomotionIdleTurns
enumval.description: Prevent CTaskQuadLocomotion from blending in idle turns, regardless of desired/currenting heading differential.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockHeadbobbingToRadio
enumval.description: Blocks ped from headbobbing to radio music in vehicles.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PlayFPSIdleFidgets
enumval.description: Allows us to load and play idle fidgets in TaskMotionAiming

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceExtraLongBlendInForPedSkipIdleCoverTransition
enumval.description: When putting a ped directly into cover, the ped will blend in the new cover anims slowly to prevent a pose pop

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlendingOutFPSIdleFidgets
enumval.description: True if FPS idle fidgets are blending out

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_FPSSwimUseSwimMotionTask
enumval.description: Set to true when we are pressing forward on the left stick in FPS mode so we switch from Aiming to Swimmimg/Diving motion tasks

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_FPSSwimUseAimingMotionTask
enumval.description: Set to true when we are strafing in water in FPS mode so we use the motion aiming task

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_FiringWeaponWhenReady
enumval.description: set when ped has decided to fire weapon when ready, used in FPS mode

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsBlindFiring
enumval.description: True if the blind fire task is running

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsPeekingFromCover
enumval.description: True if the ped is peeking in cover

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_TaskSkipProcessPreComputeImpacts
enumval.description: True to bail out of ProcessPreComputeImpacts

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableAssistedAimLockon
enumval.description: Don't ever try to lock on to this ped with cinematic aim

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_FPSAllowAimIKForThrownProjectile
enumval.description: To control enabling of FPS aim IK while using a projectile until it is ready

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForcePreCameraAiAnimUpdateIfFirstPerson
enumval.description: Force a pre camera ai and animation update if the ped is the first person camera target during the pre camera update

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_NoCollisionDamageFromOtherPeds
enumval.description: Any ped this is set on won't register damage from collisions against other peds.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockCameraSwitching
enumval.description: Block camera view mode switching.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_NeverDieFromCapsuleRagdollSettings
enumval.description: Negate the capsule's preference for ragdoll triggering death on this ped.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_InContactWithDeepSurface
enumval.description: ped is in contact with GTA_DEEP_SURFACE_TYPE bounds

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IncludePedReferenceVelocityWhenFiringProjectiles
enumval.description: Add on the ped's velocity to the projectile's initial velocity.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForcePreCameraAnimUpdate
enumval.description: Force a pre camera animation update if the ped is the first person camera target during the pre camera update

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableHelmetCullFPS
enumval.description: Disables PV_FLAG_HIDE_IN_FIRST_PERSON from culling the prop in CPedPropsMgr::RenderPropsInternal

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableFPSArmIK
enumval.description: Disables FPS arm IK in CTaskPlayerOnFoot::IsStateValidForFPSIK

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableRightArmIKInCoverOutroFPS
enumval.description: Turn off right arm IK during cover outros in FPS mode when set

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_WeaponBlockedInFPSMode
enumval.description: True if running CTaskWeaponBlocked in FPS mode

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ScriptClearingPedTasks
enumval.description: Set in CommandClearPedTasksImmediately in commands_task.cpp

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_WasFPSJumpingWithProjectile
enumval.description: ped was jumping on foot with projectile in hand

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_WaypointPlaybackSlowMoreForCorners
enumval.description: slow for corners more aggressively for waypoint playback

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_FPSPlacingProjectile
enumval.description: True while placing a projectile in FPS mode

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseBulletPenetrationForGlass
enumval.description: Ped will use bullet penetration code when glass material is hit.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_FPSPlantingBombOnFloor
enumval.description: Doing a floor plant with a bomb in FPS mode

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceSkipFPSAimIntro
enumval.description: don't do FPS Aim intro

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_CanBePinnedByFriendlyBullets
enumval.description: If set on a ped then they are allowed to be pinned by bullets from friendly peds

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableLeftArmIKInCoverOutroFPS
enumval.description: Turn off left arm IK during cover outros in FPS mode when set

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableSpikeStripRoadBlocks
enumval.description: Blocks road blocks with spike strips from spawning

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SkipFPSUnHolsterTransition
enumval.description: skip aim unholster transition

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PutDownHelmetFX
enumval.description: trigger the put down helmet fx

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IsLowerPriorityMeleeTarget
enumval.description: Peds marked with this flag will only be able to be hit by the player if the player explicitly presses the melee button

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceScanForEventsThisFrame
enumval.description: disable timeslicing of event scanning

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_StartProjectileTaskWithPrimingDisabled
enumval.description: Set this flag to disable priming when the projectile task starts up until the attack trigger is released and pressed again

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_CheckFPSSwitchInCameraUpdate
enumval.description: Set if we want to perform a second AI/anim update when switching between first person/third person

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceAutoEquipHelmetsInAicraft
enumval.description: Force ped to auto-equip a helmet om entering aircraft. Overrides PCF_DisableAutoEquipHelmetsInAicraft (set in the interaction menu)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockRemotePlayerRecording
enumval.description: Flag used by replay editor to disable recording specified remote players (for url:bugstar:2218297).

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_InflictedDamageThisFrame
enumval.description: Inflicted damage this frame

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseFirstPersonVehicleAnimsIfFPSCamNotDominant
enumval.description: allow FPS vehicle anims even if FPS camera isn't dominant

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceIntoStandPoseOnJetski
enumval.description: puts the ped in a standing pose on the jetski

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_InAirDefenceSphere
enumval.description: Ped is located inside an air defence sphere.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SuppressTakedownMeleeActions
enumval.description: This will suppress all takedown melee actions (RA_IS_TAKEDOWN or RA_IS_STEALTH_KILL, defined in action_table.meta)

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_InvertLookAroundControls
enumval.description: Inverts lookaround controls (right stick / mouse) for this player, for this frame.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IgnoreCombatManager
enumval.description: Allows attacking ped to engage another entity without waiting for its turn (if there's multiple attackers).

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseBlendedCamerasOnUpdateFpsCameraRelativeMatrix
enumval.description: Check if there is an active camera blending and use the blended camera frame when compute the FPS camera relative matrix.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceMeleeCounter
enumval.description: Forces the ped to perform a dodge and a counter move if it's attacked.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_WasHitByVehicleMelee
enumval.description: Indicates that ped was hit by vehicle melee attack.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_SuppressNavmeshForEnterVehicleTask
enumval.description: Dont allow ped to use navmesh when navigating in TaskEnterVehicle

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisablePlayerCombatRoll
enumval.description: Disables player combat rolling.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_IgnoreDetachSafePositionCheck
enumval.description: Will ignore safe position check on detaching the ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_DisableEasyLadderConditions
enumval.description: Prevents the more forgiving MP ladder detection settings from being used, and forces SP settings.

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PlayerIgnoresScenarioSpawnRestrictions
enumval.description: Makes local player ignore certain scenario spawn restrictions on scenarios that respect this flag

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UsingDrone
enumval.description: Indicates player is using Drone from Battle DLC

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_ForceWantedLevelWhenKilled
enumval.description: Will force the player that killed this ped to get wanted level, even if he wouldnt otherwise

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseScriptedWeaponFirePosition
enumval.description: Will use scripted firing position on the clones of this ped on other machines

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_EnableCollisionOnNetworkCloneWhenFixed
enumval.description: Enable collision on player ped network clones when physics is fixed

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_UseExtendedRagdollCollisionCalculator
enumval.description: Use extended logic for determining damage instigator for ragdoll collisions

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PreventLockonToFriendlyPlayers
enumval.description: Prevent the player locking on to friendly players

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_OnlyAbortScriptedAnimOnMovementByInput
enumval.description: Modifies AF_ABORT_ON_PED_MOVEMENT to only trigger an abort when movement would be caused by player input

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_PreventAllStealthKills
enumval.description: Prevents stealth take downs from being preformed on a ped

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_BlockFallTaskFromExplosionDamage
enumval.description: Prevent peds from entering a fall task if affected by explosion damage

enumval.name: CPED_RESET_FLAG_AllowPedRearEntry
enumval.description: Mimics the behaviour like with boss peds by holding the button for entering the rear seats
